name: Data Optimization
description: Specialized optimization qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Close Combat
qualities.description: The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to its Accuracy Pool when using a [MELEE] tagged Attack. This bonus increases to +5 if the Target has been Attacked since the end of its last turn.

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Ranged Striker
qualities.description: The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to its Accuracy when using a [RANGE] Tagged Attack. The Digimon gains +2 to its Range and Effective Limit.

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Warden
qualities.description: The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to Armor. The Digimon can take an Interrupt Action spending 1 less Action (potentially a Free Action) once per Combat.

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Brawler
qualities.description: The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to all Skill Checks made to initiate or during Clashes. The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to Damage when Attacking a Digimon it’s Clashing with.

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Speedster
qualities.description: The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to its Movement. The Digimon ignores the first penalty to its Dodge from being Attacked after its turn.

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Effect Warrior
qualities.description: The Digimon gains +1 Potency to all Attack Effect Tags that use a Derived Stat from the Caster.

qualities.name: Data Optimization: Variable
qualities.description: The Digimon can reroll a Skill Check or Pool Check it has made once per Round (which resets at the end of the Digimon’s turns) during Combat. It must take the new result.
